name: Kokoro FastAPI Serverless Wrapper
description: Serverless wrapper for the proven Kokoro FastAPI image - seamless RunPod compatibility
readme:
# Kokoro FastAPI Serverless Wrapper

**Lightweight wrapper** that uses the proven `ghcr.io/remsky/kokoro-fastapi-gpu:latest` image and adds RunPod serverless compatibility.

## How it works:
1. Starts your existing FastAPI internally on port 8880
2. Proxies RunPod requests to FastAPI endpoints
3. Converts responses back to RunPod format

## Usage (OpenAI-compatible):

```json
{
  "input": {
    "model": "kokoro",
    "input": "Your text here",
    "voice": "af_bella",
    "response_format": "mp3",
    "speed": 1.0
  }
}
```

## Advantages:
✓ Uses proven working pod image
✓ Zero code changes to FastAPI
✓ All existing features preserved
✓ Voice combinations work: "af_bella+af_sky"
✓ All formats: mp3, wav, opus, flac
✓ Lightweight: only +5MB overhead
